message.body: Yo dude. Can we do our thing later than earlier?
Yes. I think. I'm smart and forgot that I'm going to the airport at 11 pm for my sister's homecoming and I have no idea what's going after that. I'll
Oh! It's no big deal! Spend time with the whole fam damily
Yeah, we'll see and I'll let you know
Are you there? We're going to grab a burrito then I'll be headed that way.
I work til 12 then I can be there...
Oof, I don't know if I can stay up that late. I've been making some bad decisions lately...
All right, well, I hope those decisions don't involve meth and I guess if we do it tonight, sweet, if not, meh. Sucks that I just found out that I'm wor
king the same shift every Monday and Tuesday this month.
